title: The Shawshank Redemption
description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

title: Pulp Fiction
description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

title: Forrest Gump
description: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, the Watergate scandal and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75.

title: The Lion King
oscars_won_details: Best Original Song (Can You Feel the Love Tonight)
description: Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.

title: Léon: The Professional
description: 12-year-old Mathilda is reluctantly taken in by Léon, a professional assassin, after her family is murdered. An unusual relationship forms as she becomes his protégée and learns the assassin's trade.

title: Speed
description: A young police officer must prevent a bomb exploding aboard a city bus by keeping its speed above 50 mph.

title: Ed Wood
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Supporting Role (Martin Landau)
description: Ambitious but troubled movie director Edward D. Wood Jr. tries his best to fulfill his dreams, despite his lack of talent.

title: Four Weddings and a Funeral
description: Over the course of five social occasions, a committed bachelor must consider the notion that he may have discovered love.

title: Quiz Show
description: A young lawyer investigates a potentially rigged television quiz show in the 1950s, uncovering a scandal involving a charming contestant.

title: True Lies
description: A fearless, globe-trotting, terrorist-battling secret agent has his life turned upside down when he discovers his wife might be having an affair with a used car salesman.

title: Clerks
description: A day in the lives of two convenience clerks named Dante and Randal as they annoy customers, discuss movies, and play hockey on the store roof.

title: Interview with the Vampire
description: A vampire tells his epic life story: love, betrayal, loneliness, and hunger.

title: Natural Born Killers
description: Two victims of traumatized childhoods become lovers and psychopathic serial murderers irresponsibly glorified by the mass media.

title: The Crow
description: A man brutally murdered comes back to life as an undead avenger of his and his fiancée's murder.

title: Dumb and Dumber
description: The cross-country adventures of two good-hearted but incredibly stupid friends.

title: The Mask
description: Bank clerk Stanley Ipkiss is transformed into a manic superhero when he wears a mysterious mask.

title: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective
description: A goofy detective specializing in animals goes in search of the missing mascot of the Miami Dolphins.

title: Heavenly Creatures
description: Two teenage friends share an obsessive fantasy life that leads them to commit a desperate crime.

title: Chungking Express
description: Two melancholy Hong Kong policemen fall in love: one with a mysterious female underworld figure, the other with a beautiful and ethereal waitress at a late-night restaurant.

title: Three Colors: Red
description: A model discovers that her neighbor is keen on invading people's privacy.

title: Little Women
description: The March sisters live and grow in post-Civil War America.

title: Legends of the Fall
description: In the early 1900s, three brothers and their father living in the remote wilderness of Montana are affected by betrayal, history, love, nature, and war.

title: The Madness of King George
description: The aging King George III of England exhibits signs of madness, a problem little understood in 1788. As the monarch alternates between bouts of confusion and violent outbursts of temper, his hapless doctors attempt the ineffectual cures of the time.

title: Bullets Over Broadway
description: In 1928 New York, a struggling playwright is forced to cast a mobster's talentless girlfriend in his latest drama in order to get it produced.

title: Hoop Dreams
description: A film following the lives of two inner-city Chicago boys who struggle to become college basketball players on the road to going professional.

title: The Adventures of Priscilla, Queen of the Desert
description: Two drag queens and a transgender woman contract to perform a drag show at a resort in Alice Springs, a resort town in the remote Australian desert.

title: Muriel's Wedding
description: A young social outcast in Australia steals money from her parents to finance a vacation where she hopes to find happiness, and perhaps love.

title: Reality Bites
description: A documentary filmmaker and her fellow Gen X graduates face life after college, looking for work and love in Houston.

title: The Hudsucker Proxy
description: A naive business graduate is installed as president of a manufacturing company as part of a stock scam.

title: Maverick
description: Bret Maverick, needing money for a poker tournament, faces various comic mishaps and challenges, including a charming woman thief.

title: Clear and Present Danger
description: CIA Analyst Jack Ryan is drawn into an illegal war fought by the US government against a Colombian drug cartel.

title: Stargate
description: An interstellar teleportation device, found in Egypt, leads to a planet with humans resembling ancient Egyptians who worship the god Ra.

title: The Santa Clause
description: When a man inadvertently makes Santa fall off of his roof on Christmas Eve, he finds himself magically recruited to take his place.

title: Disclosure
description: A computer specialist is sued for sexual harassment by a former lover turned boss who initiated the act forcefully, which threatens both his career and his personal life.

title: The Client
description: A young boy who witnesses the suicide of a mafia lawyer hires an attorney to protect him when the District Attorney tries to use him to take down a mob family.

title: Mary Shelley's Frankenstein
description: When the brilliant but unorthodox scientist Dr. Victor Frankenstein rejects the artificial man that he has created, the Creature escapes and later swears revenge.

title: Wolf
description: A publisher finds his life taking a turn for the surreal and terrifying after he's bitten by a wolf on a business trip.

title: The River Wild
description: A rafting expert takes on a pair of armed killers while navigating a violent river.

title: Nobody's Fool
description: A stubborn man past his prime has to confront his inability to grow up when his estranged son and family come to stay with him.

title: Blue Sky
description: A nuclear engineer in the Army and his volatile wife move to a base in Alabama, where her behavior and a government cover-up threaten their lives.

title: Shallow Grave
description: Three friends discover their new flatmate dead but loaded with cash.

title: Eat Drink Man Woman
description: A senior chef lives with his three grown daughters; the middle one finds her future plans affected by unexpected events and the life changes of the other household members.

title: Serial Mom
description: A sweet mother takes a little too much at heart for the defense of her family.

title: The Last Seduction
description: A devious woman steals seven hundred thousand dollars from her drug-dealing husband and hides out in a small town where she meets a simple man and convinces him to help her kill her husband.

title: Wes Craven's New Nightmare
description: A demonic force has chosen Freddy Krueger as its portal to the real world. Can Heather Langenkamp play the part of Nancy one last time and trap the evil trying to enter our world?

title: Immortal Beloved
description: The life and death of the legendary Ludwig van Beethoven. Alongside all that work that is known and loved, the movie uncovers the pain and longing of the composer.

title: Three Colors: White
description: After his wife divorces him for his impotence, a Polish immigrant plots to get even with her.

title: Once Were Warriors
description: A family descended from Maori warriors is bedeviled by a violent father and the societal problems of being treated as outcasts.

title: Crumb
description: An intimate portrait of the controversial cartoonist Robert Crumb and his traumatized family.

title: Timecop
description: An officer for a security agency that regulates time travel must fend off a corrupt politician who has a past with the officer.
